parameters.name: NamespaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the namespace where the Secret resides. If the namespace is the default namespace, you need to only enter the region ID, such as `cn-beijing`.

parameters.name: SecretId
parameters.description: The ID of the Secret instance to be queried. You can call the [ListSecrets](~~466929~~) operation to view the IDs of Secrete instances.
